item.title: 【Miscellaneous】PC GAMES - Silent Hill 2: Enhanced Edition (2018)
item.description:
Silent Hill 2: Enhanced Edition is an ongoing project of enhancement packages that makes the PC version of Silent Hill 2 compatible with modern hardware and playable in widescreen aspect ratios, while improving visuals, audio, and bugs. Examples of what Silent Hill 2: Enhanced Edition provides are:
  • High definition game resolutions
  • Upscaled fonts, videos, and images
  • Restored soft shadows and audio quality
  • Improved controller/mouse support
  • Widescreen (16:9) camera fixes
  • 60 FPS mode with high framerate fixes
  • Restored fog and post-processing effects and much more
Made by a collaborative team of programmers, modders, and artists, Silent Hill 2: Enhanced Edition provides a definitive Silent Hill 2 HD experience.



Premier video:

Tutorial video by Dan Mason:

GAME INSTALLATION:
  1. Download Silent Hill 2 (Director's Cut):
  2. Install the game on your computer as described in the tutorial video.
  3. Don't forget to crack the game as described in the tutorial.
ENHANCED EDITION PATCH:
NOTE: a stable connection to the internet is needed for this step.
  1. Download the Enhanced Edition setup file.
  2. Install the patch on your computer as described in the tutorial video (this will take approximately 20 minutes more or less, depending on your internet connection)
  3. Set your game options in SH2EEconfig.exe (inside the game folder)
  4. Set the game shortcut so that it always runs as administrator.
READY TO PLAY!

Screenshots:
